function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to infectious agents","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improving ventilation, and using personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and personal protective equipment","People":"Building occupants, particularly those in close proximity to others","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"High agent exposure times","Impact":"Extended exposure increases disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Reducing the duration of exposure, implementing air disinfection systems, and promoting frequent sanitization","Technologies":"Air disinfection systems, UV sterilization, and sanitization equipment","People":"Building occupants, particularly those with prolonged exposure times","Owner":"Building management, occupant organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing","Impact":"Greater risk of person-to-person transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcing and promoting social distancing guidelines, adjusting building layouts, and using occupancy monitoring systems","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, space utilization analysis tools, and building layout design software","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility operators"}]}
